name: The Learning Island 2D
description:
Learning French and like 2D platformer games? Learn, quiz yourself, and permanently reinforce your knowledge of 4 French verbs while playing The Learning Island 2D, a platformer game!

Learning and remembering how to conjugate verbs in French can be tedious when done on paper or online. This game keeps you "forcing" you to think answers by playing through a level and beating enemies. There are 17 levels. Each one contains a Q block (Question block) and an N block (Nice solutions) or the N block can be a bit of humor!

This game contains some real-life content centered around the Montreal, Quebec (Canada) culture. This was mainly designed to correlate with the theme of learning the French language as this language is the dominant language in Montreal.
